mapper.select:
SELECT l.id as id, l.ip as ip, u.loginName as operateUser, l.operate_module as operateModule, l.log_content as logContent, l.create_time as createTime, l.update_time as updateTime, u.id as userId FROM sys_log l LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = l.user_id where 1=1
and ( ip like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') or operate_module like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log (id, ip, operate_user, operate_module, log_content, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{ip}, #{operateUser}, #{operateModule}, #{logContent}, #{createTime});
